name: Dungeon Game (SomeDungeonGame)
description:
Souls-like game with procedural generation. But enough buzzwords, have a look at some webms instead:

Combat

Procedural Generation

Equipment

Controls

Currently only supports keyboard.

Movement - WASD

Camera - Mouse

Attack - Mouse1

Target - Tab

Block - Hold Left Shift (only when shield is equipped and targeting)

Open Inventory - i

Loot Enemy - F

Exit Game - Alt + F4

Features

One of everything. This is a very cursory glance of what is to come once all the base systems are in place. There is currently a single enemy, a handful of items and a single world.

Notes

Your feedback is valuable! Please send any feedback, ideas or criticism to this game/account by commenting or sending a private message. Everything is welcome.

The AI pathfinding takes a little time to kick in, so if the enemies don't move, try waiting a little.

Serious bug: In rare cases when generating of the world, the generation will crash. You can see this as nothing new will pop up into view, or you might freeze entirely at the loading screen (Error visible in another window). At this point you will have to restart the game. Sorry about that!
